author: Peter Sullivan
title: Why the White House is highlighting virus 'positivity rates'
description: A key metric is cropping up more and more at the coronavirus task force briefings.
content:
A key metric is cropping up more and more at the coronavirus task force briefings.
White House response coordinator Deborah Birx on Wednesday and Thursday highlighted what she called the positive rate of coronavirus tests, a figure that helps measure the sev… [+4439 chars]
